reviews.name: Marcy Elliptical: NS-1201E
reviews.reviewText: I really love Marcy exercise equipment. The brand is very affordable, especially for such a typically expensive piece of equipment. I have a Marcy recumbent bike as well that is still going strong after a year. I have tried many less expensive ellipticals I'm the past, but they were not at all durable and nothing like was advertised. But I definitely recommend this one. I am 5'2 and the stride, set on the shortest distance is perfect for me. I am also very over weight, 250+ and I don't feel like I'm too much for the machine. It's fairly stable, takes a little breaking in at first, but compared to other elliptical for this price, it's ridiculously sturdy. Mine is on carpet though, on a hard floor it would be perfect. Very quiet. Not too difficult to put together if you have ever put a piece of exercise equipment together. Overall, I am incredibly thrilled and would recommend this elliptical to anyone who is larger and trying to lose weight
reviews.title: Little known brand, big in my book!

reviews.name: Marcy Elliptical: NS-1201E
reviews.reviewText: easy to set up and very quiet...i am a 220 pound man and this machine holds me well...
reviews.title: great product

reviews.name: Marcy Elliptical: NS-1201E
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this about a week ago, and I am very happy with it. Quality, durability, size is exceptional. I don't have much room, and the overall size for this machine is great. I store/use on hardwood floor and it does not move around at all. I am 5'6 and I do enjoy the stride length of this machine. Toes DO NOT point downward with the pedals, either. I have not heard any noise come from it while in use. I hope this review is helpful for anyone looking to exercise and not spend a ton of $$$ on a machine. This does the trick!
reviews.title: Great machine for the price

reviews.name: Marcy Elliptical: NS-1201E
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that it has a tension control for those of us who not exercised in years. it is very sturdy and does not move around when in use. The quality is very good for the price.
reviews.title: Ride to Good Health
